page.title: 08LIFESTYLES: DAD'S NORMAL DAY
page.content: 12.30_1.00 a.m. My dad goes to bed. 1.30 a.m. He snores loudly! 7.45 a.m. Mum wakes him up with a cup of tea and a ginger biscuit. 7.50 a.m. He goes back to sleep. 8.30 a.m. He eventually gets up, washes and gets dressed. 8.45 a.m. He rings his firm to see what he has to do that day. 8.50 a.m. He has his{BREAKFAST}of tomatoes on toast. 8.55 a.m. He goes up to the greenhouse to pick off the side shoots from the tomato plants. 9.00 a.m. He drives off in his car. 9.30 a.m. He arrives at work. 6.30 p.m. He gets home and has a cup of coffee. If it is not raining he goes out into the{GARDEN}. 8.50 p.m. He watches a film on television.
